p.s: The text Hope of escape lost in translation, from Zia Haider Rahman, is published on 17th December 2016 in The Sunday Times.
It is about language learning and translating with the example Britain and BangladeshiBangladesh and the authors'author's own experiences.
In the first paragraph he writes, that there is much money spended on translation in the past year, but the message they send to immigrant communities is that they have to integrate alone.
After that Zia Haider Rahman describes the situation in BangladeshiBangladesh, where he comes from, and that drugs and crime are a big problem there.
Also the knowledges you collect at school are not enough.
The third part is about his arriving in Britain and his problem with speaking the new language.
Finally Zia Haider Rahman appeals to do something and that differences in a country are not good if it stops them to integrate.
